sub_title: Msc. Business Information Technology, University of Twente.
summary: I am a very curious student who loves to try and learn new things, which is why I learnt a lot of things some useful and some just interesting. After completing my very technical bachelors in Computer Engineering, I wanted to learn about business and management side of IT which motivated me to pursue a masters degree in Business Information Technology with a specialization in IT Management and Enterprise Architecture.

projects.title: Master Thesis - Application Portfolio Management Maturity :  A Grounded Theory Investigation On The Processes And Expected Benefits
projects.description:
Developed an elaborate 5-stage maturity model for Application Portfolio Management, complete with management processes, benefits a checklist of items to indicate the level of maturity. This maturity model can be used by organizations as a roadmap to realize the benefits of APM and to provide an overview to the stakeholders.

Thesis Report: https://purl.utwente.nl/essays/97057

contributors.headline: Msc. Business Information Technology, University of Twente.

projects.title: Digital Strategy for Awaves
projects.description:
Developed a comprehensive Social Media marketing strategy for Awaves to increase their customers
base. We used the digital strategy canvas to define Goals, Channels, Content, Partners, Policies, ROI, etc. and help them improve brand awareness and increase target audience reach.
We also made a social media content calendar.

projects.title: Transition of logistics company to 4PL
projects.description: Developed a Baseline architecture and conducted a SWOT analysis to develop Target architecture for the logistic company to become a 4PL company. We also described a change analysis architecture for all the viewpoints to help with the transition.

projects.title: Approaches to overcome challenges within an organization on the hard side of IT governance
projects.description:
The aim was to identify challenges in hard IT governance, and to propose approaches
to overcome these challenges. We first did a literature review after which we looked at a few case studies. after this we had interview with the director of IT for Trouw Nutrition which is part of Nutreco, to gain insights on real practical business issues regarding IT Governance and confirm our results
.

projects.title: Data visualization: Public Priorities for Primary Child Health Care for Children [MOCHA]
projects.description:
We analyzed the POCHA datasets to understand the priorities of European citizens on the
quality of primary healthcare for children. We also visualized our results and findings using Tableau

contributors.headline: Msc. Business Information Technology, University of Twente.

projects.title: Evaluation of implementation of new CRM system at the municipality of Enschede
projects.description: For the course Implementation of IT in Organizations, we analyzed the implementation of new CRM system in the municipality of Enschede. Based on the problems faced we devised a theoretical approach after which we had various interviews with the employees and saw the practical approach. We then compared the practical and theoretical approach.

projects.title: AI Bot For Competitive Gaming
projects.description:
Developed an AI bot trained using Convolutional Neural Network and LSTM to mimic and
learn from human behaviour and play the given game. The game ‘For Honor’ was used for
demonstration purpose.
